评论概述: I like the look and they fit well but they are not durable.
评论详情: At the SAME number of washes the zipper came off on both of the jackets that I bought. I got them in February 2024 and washed each of them twice a week. Both of their zippers broke off within a day of each other in July 2024. The scrub jackets were never run together in the same load of laundry. Apparently a little under 40 washes was the maximum the zippers could handle.  I bought them both in size small, one in navy, and one in black. At just under $40.00 they were a good deal. Unfortunately, I got a scrub allowance from my job for two scrub jackets a year and they only lasted me 5 months when other tops have lasted much longer.

The front is pretty but the back looks cheap and cheesy and I'd send it back if I didn't have to have this exact color for work. It's made out of the same material that the cuffs on the sleeve and waist are and you CANNOT tell in the photos. I expect it will get stretched and misshapen quickly and it's a stupidly expensive jacket for such a cheap material. (If you have ever seen men's ribbed tank undershirts, that's the material.)
